title: Quickalilli
description: This piccalilli is quick in that the vegetables remain crunchy by being added to the pickling liquid at the end (you do need to factor in 24 hours salting though!).
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz fruit and veg, include 5-6 types, such as radish pods, cucumber, courgette, nasturtium seeds, peppers, shallots or small onions, cauliflower, albino beetroot, French beans or runner beans
